attributes.action: Ensure that large supermarkets ensure that they follow the 48 hour rule with their cafe staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to food safety, you cannot work with food if you have had dihorrea or vomiting within the last 48 hours. This is to prevent passing on illnesses to customers.
This generally is ignored in one particular chain.
